description.value: For 1 minute, you gain a Fly speed of 40 feet. The first time each round that you Fly (including to hover in place), you shed burning feathers that deal [[/r {3d4}[fire]]]{3d4 fire damage} to all creatures in a @Template[type:emanation|distance:10] at the end of your movement (@Check[type:reflex|dc:29|basic:true|name:Phoenix Flask Fire Feathers|traits:consumable,evocation,fire,magical,potion|showDC:all] save).
